overview: This is a very elusive film which few people have ever seen. Le Dico only has a description of the plot and quotes from a secondary, contemporary source for the review. But the film does, or did, exist although there is the possibility that this title was also used for a re-release of P ...comme pénétration. Footage from it was probably used in other films such as Bachelières en chaleur.
title: Safari porno
